name: Jigsaw Puzzles - Magic Game
description:
Welcome to the most richly colorful universe of jigsaw puzzles! Jigsaw Puzzles is a free game and has over 40,000 easy and hard daily puzzles - HD popular photos & classic pictures. Become the best collector and puzzle solver!

As a stress-relieving and relaxing game, daily jigsaw puzzle games for adults will help you take a break and get a happy mood!

Choose the difficulty that suits you, calm down and complete it, you will get an unprecedented sense of accomplishment!

If you are obsessed about solving real jigsaw puzzles, you will definitely love our game as well!

Jigsaw puzzle on your device is as challenging as real one! In addition the jigsaw app is portable, doesn't result into any pieces being lost and encompasses a wide range of puzzle games. All these features make the jigsaw app as attractive as real jigsaw puzzles.

FEATURES

· The most fashionable picture collection game played by men, women and children every day.
· We add new tasks and puzzles everyday! Including: pets, birds, cartoons, animals, fruit!
· Friendly tools and comfortable controls for new players.
· One of the best puzzle games to exercise brain and memory, which can provide your body and mind with a perfect opportunity to relax!
· From 12 to 280 puzzle pieces. The more pieces, the harder your jigsaw puzzle game becomes.Play with your own pace: Make the jigsaw as simple/hard as you want.
· Popular HD picture jigsaws in various themes: Animal, Scenery, Plant and City.

Share your best puzzle pictures with friends and family, share your happiness, and make everyone happy!
